localize.description: See what's buzzing on Reddit in your native language

blogPost.excerpt: Use your web apps as true apps with Firework! 🚀 Turn your everyday websites into desktop apps 🕹 Keep them on hand on the Taskbar or Dock 🏁 The apps launch instantly and are immediately ready to use 🎭 Switch between your web apps using familiar methods
blogPost.body: Use your web apps as true apps with Firework! 🚀 Turn your everyday websites into desktop apps 🕹 Keep them on hand on the Taskbar or Dock 🏁 The apps launch instantly and are immediately ready to use 🎭 Switch between your web apps using familiar methods
blogPost.title: Firework 2 - Easy access to web sites and applications
blogPost.author: Alexey Fedorov

localize.description: 将您的网络应用程序作为真正的应用程序使用，Firework! 🚀 将您的日常网站变成桌面应用程序 🕹 将它们放在任务栏或停靠点上 🏁 应用程序立即启动，并立即可以使用 🎭 使用熟悉的方法在您的网络应用程序之间切换。
localize.tagline: 轻松访问网站和应用程序

localize.description: 將您的網絡應用程序作爲真正的應用程序使用，Firework! 🚀 將您的日常網站變成桌面應用程序 🕹 將它們放在任務欄或停靠點上 🏁 應用程序立即啓動，並立即可以使用 🎭 使用熟悉的方法在您的網絡應用程序之間切換。
localize.tagline: 輕鬆訪問網站和應用程序

previous.excerpt: Steady Newsletters is for independent writers, who are looking for a home for their work and are not averse to making money from it. Send professionally designed newsletters, including videos, podcasts, and tweets. Free to use, we keep 10% commission.
previous.title: Steady Newsletters - Newsletters with paid memberships for independent writers

localize.description: Steady Newsletters是为独立作家，谁正在寻找一个家为他们的工作，并不反感从它赚钱。发送专业设计的新闻通讯，包括视频、播客和推特。免费使用，我们保留10%的佣金。
localize.tagline: 为独立作家提供付费会员资格的新闻通讯。

localize.description: Steady Newsletters是爲獨立作家，誰正在尋找一個家爲他們的工作，並不反感從它賺錢。發送專業設計的新聞通訊，包括視頻、播客和推特。免費使用，我們保留10%的佣金。
localize.tagline: 爲獨立作家提供付費會員資格的新聞通訊。

next.title:
Krispy Kreme giving away free donuts to vaccinated Americans

The irony

localize.full_text:
Krispy Kreme向接种疫苗的美国人免费赠送甜甜圈。

讽刺的是

Krispy Kreme向接種疫苗的美國人免費贈送甜甜圈。

諷刺的是
